lower_chest.lungs: Clear, no nodule, consolidation, or pleural effusion

abdomen.liver: Normal in shape and contour, no focal lesions
abdomen.kidneys: Normal without lesions, hydronephrosis, or pyelonephritis, enhance and excrete contrast symmetrically
abdomen.stomach_and_small_bowel: Normal in course and caliber, no obstruction, no focal inflammatory changes

pelvis.cecum: Mild wall thickening at its base compatible with acute uncomplicated appendicitis
pelvis.large_bowel: Normal with no focal inflammatory changes

osseous_structures_and_soft_tissues.ossseous_lesions: No concerning lytic or sclerotic lesions, a 7 mm sclerotic focus in the right acetabulum likely a bone island, no fracture
